Add an extra activity only for toggle shortcuts

Sometimes when using the old shortcut, you can see the activity opening and instantly closing again. By using a transparent style for the new activity, users can never see it.
The new activity also has less to do in onCreate, so it might be a bit faster.
Users need to create their shortcuts anew in order to profit from the improvement, old shortcuts will keep working as they did before.
Side effect: using the new shortcut, ShadesActivity doesn't finish anymore when it's already open and the shortcut is launched.

Also use transparent theme for ShortcutCreationActivity

There's nothing to see, so don't make it visible

Fix bug in BootReceiver

The literal comparison of pointers of two strings was never true. This
caused Red Moon to always resume from state as if the automatic mode was
enabled.

Persist old brightness across reboot

With the lower brightness setting enabled, Red Moon will now
remember (and restore) the old brightness after an reboot.
